name: VRinyl 2000
description:
VRinyl 2000 - Electric Boogaloo

Flick Vinyls at the boring non-hype, non-electric-boogaloo non-shuffling & non-dancing men in the skatepark...

Smash your table in anger, grab the records in bullet time and flick them like a frisbee at the boring crowd... (how did we get here?)

Made at Create Jam at AAU

2019 Retro Spring Edition
